p: Baccharis heterophylla was collected in Capulálpam de Méndez, Oaxaca, México on April 2019 (BH-1). The plant material was identified by Rafael Torres Collin and a voucher specimen (1512112) was deposited at the National Herbarium (MEXU), UNAM, Mexico City. In addition, batches from February, July, and October (BH-2, BH-3 and BH-4 respectively) were collected in the same place and the same year, to analyze their content.
